content:
Brew & Brioche is known for their seasonal offerings, and the strawberry rhubarb tarts are a fan favorite!

**Weekend Deals and Discounts:**
Brew & Brioche offers some lovely deals and discounts on weekends, especially for breakfast items. Here are a few perks to look out for:

* **Weekend Brunch Special:** On Saturdays and Sundays, they offer a special brunch menu from 8 am to 2 pm. This menu features a selection of their signature breakfast items, including quiches, sandwiches, and pastries, at a discounted price.
* **Buy-One-Get-One-Free Pastry:** On Sundays, they offer a buy-one-get-one-free deal on all pastries, including their seasonal offerings like the strawberry rhubarb tarts. This is a great way to try a few different treats and share with your mom!
* **Coffee and Pastry Pairing:** On weekends, they offer a special coffee and pastry pairing deal. For a discounted price, you can choose a coffee drink and pair it with a pastry of your choice. This is a great way to try one of their specialty coffee drinks, like their signature lavender latte, with a delicious pastry.

**Loyalty Program:**
Brew & Brioche also has a loyalty program that rewards customers for frequent visits. After 10 purchases, you'll receive a free drink or pastry of your choice. This is a great way to earn rewards and try new items on their menu.

**Specials and Promotions:**
Keep an eye on their social media accounts or sign up for their newsletter to stay informed about special promotions, limited-time offers, and seasonal deals. They often feature special discounts or freebies on certain days of the week or during holidays.

When you visit, be sure to ask your barista about any current deals or promotions. They'll be happy to let you know about any special offers that might be available!
